user.title: Ddareungi setup
user.description:
Choose a collection method. Each method provides different data.

- **API (Open API Polling)**: Real-time station availability + location-based recommended station (requires an Open API key)
- **Cookie (Web Pulling)**: Your rental/return history + favorite stations status (requires a login cookie / expires)

You can add this integration multiple times (e.g., set up both methods).

api.title: API method (Open API Polling)
api.description:
Enter your Open API key and options.

- **Open API Key**: Request/issue from [Seoul Open Data Plaza (dataset)](https://data.seoul.go.kr/dataList/OA-15493/A/1/datasetView.do)
- **My location entity (optional)**: Used as the reference point for recommended stations
- **Update interval (seconds)**: API polling interval (too low may hit rate limits)
- **Station IDs**: Comma/newline separated (station number or ST code)
  - Example: `4796`, `ST-2693`
  - Tip: ST code is the most accurate.

cookie.title: Cookie method (Web Pulling)
cookie.description:
Sign in with your [Ddareungi](https://www.bikeseoul.com) account and enter your username/password.

- **Username/Password**: Used to log in (cookie generated automatically)
- **Cookie (optional)**: Advanced users can paste it directly
- **Update interval (seconds)**: 120 seconds recommended (too frequent polling may overload the server)
- If updates stop, the session likely expired. Log in again and replace the cookie.

error.cookie_invalid_format: Cookie must start with `Cookie:` and include the full header value.
error.invalid_cookie: Invalid cookie. Check the cookie value.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication. Check the API key.
error.station_not_found: Some station IDs are invalid. Please check station numbers or ST codes.
